title: Kayla McQueen: Vampire Slayer & Half-Breed
description: I was born from a human mother and a father, who had just been turned into a vampire. I am entering my senior year in high school and I am worried about much more than just getting into college.  With the rise in vampire related homicides and the witches and the wolves going on the war path, I am soon in the middle of a conflict that all sides seem to agree on one thing. They all want me dead.
author: Brett Hicks
